body.bibl: Lewis, Agnes Smith. The Mythological Acts of the Apostles, Translated from an Arabic Ms. in the Convent of Deyr-Es-Suriani, Egypt, and from Mss. in the Convent of St Catherine on Mount Sinai and in the Vatican Library, with a Translation of the Palimpsest Fragments of the Acts of Judas Thomas from Cod. Sin. Syr. 30. Horae Semiticae 4. London: C.J. Clay and Sons, 1904.
